org.xchain.framework.jxpath

Class ScopedJXPathContextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext
      • org.apache.commons.jxpath.ri.JXPathContextReferenceImpl
        • org.xchain.framework.jxpath.ScopedJXPathContextImpl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigDocumentContext

    public class ScopedJXPathContextImpl
extends org.apache.commons.jxpath.ri.JXPathContextReferenceImpl
    An implementation of JXPathContext that installs an instance of scoped QName variables into the context.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, John Trimble
